meanings.definition: To cook in hot fat or oil
meanings.sent1: I will fry the chicken in hot oil.
meanings.sent2: She fries the eggs for breakfast every morning.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to fry the ice cream for a unique dessert.
meanings.sent4: The sun fries the pavement on hot summer days.
meanings.sent5: The sizzle of the fries in the pan was music to her ears.

meanings.definition: To become or cause to become crisp and brown by cooking in hot fat or oil
meanings.sent1: The fish will fry quickly in the hot oil.
meanings.sent2: The onions will fry until they are golden brown.
meanings.sent3: The idea of frying ice cream sounded strange but intriguing.
meanings.sent4: The sun's rays seemed to fry the leaves on the tree.
meanings.sent5: The smell of frying bacon wafted through the kitchen.
